record.id: field.name="mappingValue" and file.name="SurveyParameterMapping" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: mappingValue
record.file.name: SurveyParameterMapping

detail.detail: The value is depending on the mapping type.
Field -> A valid field name of the selected object.
Variable -> Any variable which is available at Survey run time.
RAD Expression -> Any valid RAD expression like jscalls which returns the required value.
Predefined -> The predefined parameter are fix settings which can be easily used in the parameter configuration.
- Recipient Email = return the email address of the recipient
- Recipient Email = returns the email address of the recipient
- Recipient Name = returns the name of the recipient.
- Language = returns the language of the recipient.
These 3 parameters are closely linked with the Recipients configured in the recipientâ€™s area. Each identified recipient will receive ONE email.
- Web URL = return the URL to the full webclient for the corresponding record.
- Ess URL = returns the URL to the ESS client for the record
- External URL = returns the configured external URL to the Survey solution to the used in the Body of the email message
